item.description:
S.O.S - Steppin' On Saturday

The Original Steppers of Boston invite you to the Steppers Set at Slade's from 4 PM - 8 PM.
Saturday October 23, 2010


Featuring DJ Bright Eyes

If you like to wind down or wind up on an early Saturday to early evening;
If you like to listen to intoxicating sounds that will make you bop your head,
snap your finger, and who knows might even make you wanna dance.

DJ Bright Eyes has the hottest, the smoothest, the most exclusive tracks ** of the funkiest beats of Jazz,
Classic R & B, R & B, some of the hip-hoppest hip hop, even a few of the "Dusties"..

You will not hear these tunes anywhere, except at Slade's, Saturday, 10/23, 4-8:00 p.m..


Bring friends of TOSOB and meet many more. Hope to see you.



Line Dancing

Steppin Birthday Dance for Libra born Steppers


Circle Time

Come get your Step On..



Cash bar...Good Food.... A GREAT TIME


RSVP now

www.steppersofboston.com

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: S.O.S - Steppin' On Saturday - Original Steppers of Boston Set @ Slade's 10/23
